content.text: Match ends, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1, Barcelona 1.
Second Half ends, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1, Barcelona 1.

Attempt missed. Jonathan Tah (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Stefan Kießling with a headed pass following a set piece situation.
Karim Bellarabi (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Juan Cámara (Barcelona).
Attempt saved. Karim Bellarabi (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Julian Brandt.
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Kyriakos Papadopoulos replaces Christoph Kramer because of an injury.
Attempt saved. Chicharito (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Stefan Kießling with a cross.
